## ReadableLiquity interface

Read the state of the Liquity protocol.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ReadableLiquity 
```

## Remarks

Implemented by [EthersLiquity](./lib-ethers.ethersliquity.md)<!-- -->.
